snippet: Forest City Ratner Companies is looking for an investor to buy up to 80 percent of the rest of the $5 billion development in Brooklyn.
abstract: Developer Bruce C Ratner is looking for an investor to buy up to 80 percent of remainder of the $5 billion Atlantic Yards development project in Brooklyn, which will eventually include 14 residential buildings and 6,000 apartments as well as offices and hotels; real estate analysts estimate deal could be worth as much as $800 million for Forest City Ratner Companies.
lead_paragraph: Forest City Ratner Companies is looking for an investor to buy up to 80 percent of the rest of the $5 billion development in Brooklyn.

headline.main: To Enhance Atlantic Yards, a Plan to Sell a Big Part of It
headline.print_headline: To Enhance Atlantic Yards, A Plan to Sell A Big Part of It
